prodNameC: 英傑核酸引子式低解析人類白血球抗原第二型分型試驗系統
prodNameE: Invitrogen AllSet Gold SSP Class Ⅱ HLA Low Resolution Typing Kit
ingredientsDesc:
Components：
1. 96well polycarbonate PCR trays containing 5µl/well of optimized primer solution overlaid with paraffin oil. / Quantity: 2 to 10 trays (kit dependent)
2. 75-580µl aliquots of optimized PCR Buffer containing dNTPs and Gel Loading Buffer. 
  / Quantity: 10 - 40 vials (kit dependent)
3. Plastic sealers for sealing PCR trays. / Quantity: 3 - 11 (kit dependent)
4. Gel Documentation Form. / Quantity: 10 - 40 (kit dependent)
5. Worksheets. / Quantity: 11 - 41 (kit dependent)
6. Primer Mix Specificity Table. / Quantity: 1
7. Certificate of Analysis/Tray Configuration. / Quantity: 1
applicantAddr: 新北市蘆洲區集賢路393號4樓
efficacy: 用來鑑別及分型人類第二型白血球抗原的器材。
mdFormat: ▪ 型號/規格/品名：54370D (20tests/Kit) AllSet Gold SSP HLA-DR Low Res. Kit54380D (20tests/Kit) AllSet Gold SSP HLA-DRDQ Low Res. Kit54390D (20tests/Kit) AllSet Gold SSP HLA-DQ Low Res. Kit▪ Product Packaged：Product components include the sequence specific primer mixes, PCR Buffer GL.The primer mixes overlaid with paraffin oil, are packaged in an adhesively sealed 96-well polycarbonate tray. The tray is packaged in a heat sealable foil pouch. The PCR Buffer GL is packaged in 0.5ml or 2.0ml polypropylene tubes, dependent upon the volume necessary for the test. These tubes are placed into a small box and the pouched trays and boxes are packaged together into a large box, which the whole makes up a kit.

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: B 血液學及病理學裝置
